title: Pattern For Embroidery, "Louis XVI' and "Marie Antoinette"
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Printed pattern for Cut Fabric embroidery. Design is of two medallions, Louis XV1 and Marie Antoinette

Pattern For Embroidery, "Louis XVI' and "Marie Antoinette".
linen. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz. 1983-14-5.
